title: diamond Collection Watch Face
summary: Make your Wearable shine with these glamorous watch face customizations!
description: The ‘diamond Collection – Watch Face’ is a collection of glittering watch faces for your Android Wear device. Its exquisite yet simple design makes it suitable for any style and any time of the day and the sparkly animation adds an extra touch of luxury to your wearable. Create your own unique watch face by customizing the colors of the face and the details separately. There is a vast variety of possibilities to choose from: this exclusive collection features a selection of 50 exquisite color combinations. Show your individual style and match the colors to your mood. Turn your smartwatch into a diamond-paved fashion accessory and an enchanting eye-catcher: Add a lustrous splash of color to your wrist to complement your fashionable outfit or go for a classic, timeless look of crystals and subtle colors instead.Which combination do you feel like wearing today?‘diamond Collection – Watch Face’ is optimized for both round and square smartwatches. It is compatible with Moto 360, LG G Watch R, Samsung Gear Live, Sony SmartWatch 3 and more.How to install it:1. Download the ‘diamond Collection – Watch Face’ watch faces on your smartphone or tablet. The app will be installed automatically on your Android Wear device.2. Open the Android Wear App, select ‘diamond Collection – Watch Face’ and customize your watch face to your liking. You can also long press on your smartwatch and select ‘diamond Collection – Watch Face’ there.Thank you for using ‘diamond Collection Watch Face’!Get in touch with HandyGamesTM:http://www.handy-games.comJoin us on Facebook:http://www.fb.com/handygamesFollow us on Instagram:http://instagram.com/handygamesStay tuned on Google+:http://goo.gl/qkjngmSubscribe to our channel on YouTube:http://goo.gl/2Kq6yYCheck news on Twitter:http://www.twitter.com/handy_gamesFollow us on Instagram:http://instagram.com/handygamesImprint: http://www.handy-games.com/contact/© www.handy-games.com GmbH
descriptionHTML:
The ‘diamond Collection – Watch Face’ is a collection of glittering watch faces for your Android Wear device. Its exquisite yet simple design makes it suitable for any style and any time of the day and the sparkly animation adds an extra touch of luxury to your wearable. Create your own unique watch face by customizing the colors of the face and the details separately. There is a vast variety of possibilities to choose from: this exclusive collection features a selection of 50 exquisite color combinations. Show your individual style and match the colors to your mood. Turn your smartwatch into a diamond-paved fashion accessory and an enchanting eye-catcher: Add a lustrous splash of color to your wrist to complement your fashionable outfit or go for a classic, timeless look of crystals and subtle colors instead.
Which combination do you feel like wearing today?

‘diamond Collection – Watch Face’ is optimized for both round and square smartwatches. It is compatible with Moto 360, LG G Watch R, Samsung Gear Live, Sony SmartWatch 3 and more.

How to install it:
1. Download the ‘diamond Collection – Watch Face’ watch faces on your smartphone or tablet. The app will be installed automatically on your Android Wear device.
2. Open the Android Wear App, select ‘diamond Collection – Watch Face’ and customize your watch face to your liking. You can also long press on your smartwatch and select ‘diamond Collection – Watch Face’ there.

Thank you for using ‘diamond Collection Watch Face’!

comments: This crashes for me also. It looks beautiful for the split second it actually shows on my screen, but what good is it if it won't work???
Crashes This watchface crashes every time.  I have the 2nd Gen Moto 360 running Android Wear 1.3.0
Nice watch face Can't seem to change the look on my wearable watch it's just the one look
PLEASE FIX!!!  Mine just stopped working!  I have tried uninstalling and reinstalling several times!!!  :( Please add battery level to faces!!
Works great and looks good on my Huawei smartwatch
crap crashes doesn't work on michael kors smart watch
